author: @telemundoCHI
title: Trump dice que si gana en noviembre, despide al fiscal Smith ‚Äúen dos segundos‚Äù
text:
El expresidente Donald Trump dijo el jueves que, si es elegido para un segundo mandato en noviembre, despedir√≠a inmediatamente al fiscal especial Jack Smith, quien present√≥ dos acusaciones federales en su contra.
El presentador de radio conservador Hugh Hewitt le pregunt√≥ a Trump si planea indultarse a s√≠ mismo o despedir a Smith el d√≠a en que tomar√° juramento.
‚ÄúEs tan f√°cil, lo despedir√≠a en dos segundos‚Äù, dijo Trump, quien agreg√≥ que obtuvo ‚Äúinmunidad en la Corte Suprema‚Äù y llam√≥ a Smith una ‚Äúpersona corrupta‚Äù.
El expresidente tambi√©n dijo que no cree que los dem√≥cratas, si recuperan la mayor√≠a en la C√°mara, lo sometan a un juicio pol√≠tico si despide a Smith del Departamento de Justicia.
Estados Unidos 2 Oct Trump ‚Äúrecurri√≥ a delitos para intentar permanecer en el cargo‚Äù, seg√∫n el fiscal Smith Estados Unidos 27 Ago Fiscal presenta nueva versi√≥n de caso penal contra Trump tras fallo de impunidad presidencial La oficina de Smith se neg√≥ a hacer comentarios sobre las declaraciones de Trump. Despedirlo como fiscal especial podr√≠a potencialmente poner fin al procesamiento del gobierno federal contra Trump.
Si bien Smith apel√≥ el fallo en Florida que desestim√≥ el caso de documentos clasificados contra el expresidente, el fiscal especial todav√≠a est√° llevando adelante el caso de interferencia electoral en su contra en Washington, D.C.
Trump ha retrasado con √©xito los procedimientos judiciales en el caso de interferencia electoral debido a sus reclamos de inmunidad presidencial, que finalmente fueron resueltos por la Corte Suprema en julio, por lo que no se ha fijado un juicio en el caso.
La jueza Tanya Chutkan permiti√≥ la publicaci√≥n de cientos de p√°ginas de documentos muy censurados la semana pasada que conten√≠an evidencia que el fiscal especial estaba usando para el procesamiento.
En respuesta, Trump llam√≥ a Chutkan ‚Äúla persona m√°s malvada‚Äù y a Smith ‚Äúun cachorro enfermo‚Äù y calific√≥ la liberaci√≥n como una ‚Äúinterferencia electoral‚Äù.
El expresidente los ha menospreciado a ambos en numerosas ocasiones, lo que llev√≥ al juez a emitir una orden de censura contra √©l. Prohib√≠a a Trump hacer declaraciones sobre posibles testigos o los fiscales federales que lo acusaron.
El a√±o pasado, Trump advirti√≥ que Smith y otros funcionarios del Departamento de Justicia terminar√≠an en una instituci√≥n mental si es reelegido.
En un esfuerzo por anticiparse a cualquier movimiento de Trump si regresa a la Casa Blanca, el representante Adam Schiff, dem√≥crata por California, un feroz cr√≠tico de Trump, present√≥ una legislaci√≥n el mes pasado con copatrocinadores dem√≥cratas que impedir√≠a que un presidente en funciones desestime un proceso penal activo en su contra, una medida que no ir√° a ninguna parte en la C√°mara controlada por los republicanos.
Este art√≠culo se public√≥ originalmente en ingl√©s en NBC News . Haz clic aqu√≠ para leerlo.

author: admin_l6ma5gus
title: A large family from the Chelyabinsk region spoke about state support - Pledge Times
text: On February 29, the large Zabrinin family from the Chelyabinsk region told Izvestia about state support. The Zabronin family has a mother, father and five girls. The eldest is 14 years old, one of the sisters has cerebral palsy. Dad works and mom takes care of the house, so government support is a big support. Thanks to maternal capital, they were able to buy a spacious apartment where each family member had their own place. ‚ÄúWe are headed by our dad, he supports us all, as I look after the house and the children, so that they study well and are neatly dressed. We go everywhere, exercise, and our state also helps us. There is a single guide, thank you, of course, for it, it helps a lot. There is a subsidy ‚Äì like for a disabled child, this is also a very big help. We also received maternal capital and bought this apartment,‚Äù said Ekaterina Zabrodina. Large families have benefits for utilities, special treatment in social security, and they receive gifts and vouchers for all holidays. Being a big family in Russia is becoming more and more comfortable every year. [See also Data protection Calls to Kela were directed to an individual, a couple of weeks ago Kela documents were reported drowned in the mail - ‚ÄúWe have a big organization and mistakes happen‚Äù](https://pledgetimes.com/data-protection-calls-to-kela-were-directed-to-an-individual-a-couple-of-weeks-ago-kela-documents-were-reported-drowned-in-the-mail-we-have-a-big-organization-and-mistakes-happen/) ‚ÄúI always wanted it since childhood, consciously, I always thought that there would definitely be three children. I don‚Äôt know why, because I probably grew up alone in the family. My profession is that of a mother. We have to manage everything everywhere,‚Äù shared the mother of a large family. Earlier that day, Russian President Vladimir Putin, speaking to the Federal Assembly, voiced a proposal to extend the Family Mortgage program. The head of state also announced that a new national project ‚ÄúFamily‚Äù will be launched in Russia. In addition, the head of state, in his message to the Federal Assembly, proposed extending the maternity capital program until at least 2030. At the same time, the Russian leader noted the need to increase the tax deduction. So, for the second child, he proposed to double the tax deduction ‚Äì to 2.8 thousand rubles, for the third and each subsequent child ‚Äì to 6 thousand rubles. At the same time, it is also proposed to increase the amount of annual income to which the deduction applies from 350 thousand to 450 thousand rubles. Such a support measure should be provided automatically, without submitting an application, Putin said. #large #family #Chelyabinsk #region #spoke #state #support

author: Binance News
title: Security Flaw Discovered In Uniswap iOS Wallet
text:
According to PANews, the ScaleBit security team under BitsLab has identified a vulnerability in the [Uniswap](/trade/UNI_USDT?contentId=18733476634122) iOS wallet, termed 'Mnemonic Unauthorized Access.' This flaw, discovered in October 2024, allows attackers with physical access to a device to bypass the wallet's authentication mechanism and directly access the mnemonic stored on the device.
The root cause of this vulnerability lies in the flawed design of the mnemonic storage and access mechanism. The mnemonic is not effectively encrypted at the application layer, and the conditions for triggering the recovery page are unreasonable. This makes it easy for attackers with physical access to the device to bypass the wallet's authentication mechanism and obtain the mnemonic.
Currently, this vulnerability persists in the latest version of the Uniswap Wallet (Version 1.42), posing a potential risk to all users of the wallet. Users are advised to be particularly cautious about the physical security of their devices, avoid disclosing unlock passwords, and refrain from lending their devices to others.

author: Audrey Boucher | UpNorthLive Newsroom
title: Residents in Gaylord dig out of another winter storm
text: OTSEGO COUNTY, Mich. (WPBN/WGTU) -- Gaylord residents spent Thursday digging out of another winter storm. So far this season Gaylord has dealt with two major winter storm systems, one of them was a record setter. Forecast: Lake effect snow comes to end, some areas will see some sun Friday Joshua Burleson said after a snow storm it can take him almost two hours to clear his driveway, especially when wind is also a factor. Road Crews: County road commission crews kept busy amid early season storms The area has dealt with nearly 42 inches of snowfall so far this season. ‚ÄúThe snow that we got so far is say it‚Äôs more than what we got last year. I think I used my snow blower a total of four times last year and this year it‚Äôs already been ten plus times,\" said Burleson. After Burleson cleared his own driveway Thursday, he went across the street to help his elderly neighbor by clearing their driveway as well. author: Juan Ponce Merch√°n
title: Navidad en Guayaquil: Sin heridos por explosivos y menos emergencias
text:
Navidad en Guayaquil: Sin heridos por explosivos y menos emergencias
La Navidad se celebr√≥ con un notable descenso del 61,94% en emergencias respecto al 2023
Durante el feriado de Navidad en Guayaquil, comprendido entre el 24 y 25 de diciembre de 2024, la ciudad experiment√≥ un descenso en incidentes relacionados con explosivos y otras emergencias. Seg√∫n el reporte del Benem√©rito Cuerpo de Bomberos de Guayaquil (BCBG), no se registraron heridos debido al uso de artefactos explosivos. Adicionalmente, la instituci√≥n atendi√≥ un total de 196 emergencias, marcando una reducci√≥n del 61,94% en comparaci√≥n con las 515 emergencias reportadas durante el mismo periodo en 2023.
√Ålvarez anuncia la ampliaci√≥n del malec√≥n e intervenci√≥n en Puerto Santa Ana en 2025
[Leer m√°s](https://www.expreso.ec/guayaquil/alvarez-pretende-extender-malecon-2000-e-intervenir-puerto-santa-ana-2025-225913.html)
El informe del BCBG detalla que de las 196 emergencias gestionadas en 2024, 117 fueron emergencias prehospitalarias, 49 correspondieron a incendios, 15 a incidentes relacionados con materiales peligrosos, seis a rescates y nueve a otras atenciones. Este balance contrasta con las cifras del a√±o anterior, donde se contabilizaron 376 emergencias prehospitalarias, 67 incendios, 21 incidentes de materiales peligrosos, 27 rescates y 24 otras atenciones.
Un factor relevante que contribuy√≥ a la disminuci√≥n de las emergencias fue la duraci√≥n del feriado. En 2023, el feriado de Navidad se extendi√≥ a cuatro d√≠as, mientras que en 2024 fue de solo dos d√≠as. A pesar de esta reducci√≥n, el BCBG destac√≥ la eficacia y prontitud en la respuesta de los bomberos.
Las autoridades del cuerpo de bomberos remarcaron la importancia de la prevenci√≥n y la educaci√≥n en la significativa disminuci√≥n de incidentes con materiales peligrosos y explosivos.
Un incendio en el centro
Uno de los incidentes m√°s destacados que gestion√≥ la entidad fue el incendio en una vivienda localizada en las intersecciones de las calles Francisco Campos y Rumichaca. Para controlar y extinguir el fuego, se desplegaron tres motobombas, un carro escalera, un tanquero, un veh√≠culo de materiales peligrosos y una ambulancia. Afortunadamente, este incidente no result√≥ en personas heridas.
Comunicado del Cuerpo de Bomberos
El BCBG emiti√≥ un comunicado el jueves 26 de diciembre, expresando gratitud y reconocimiento hacia el desempe√±o de sus equipos durante el feriado. "A pesar de la menor cantidad de d√≠as e incidentes que se dieron en el reciente feriado, demostramos una vez m√°s el compromiso con la comunidad guayaquile√±a", manifest√≥ la entidad.
¬°El uso de explosivos puede dejar secuelas permanentes! üò¢
‚Äî Bomberos Guayaquil (@BomberosGYE)
‚ùå Evita su uso por tu bien y el de los tuyos.[#ConcienciaPorLaInocencia][#NoALaPirotecnia][pic.twitter.com/dtDFyhKItb][December 25, 2024]

author: dezabala
title: [VIDEO] Cristiano Ronaldo celebra su gol n√∫mero 900 como profesional
text: [Daniel Zabala ](/autores/daniel-zabala) [VIDEO] Cristiano Ronaldo celebra su gol n√∫mero 900 como profesional Cristiano Ronaldo anota su gol n√∫mero 900 como profesional en la Liga de Naciones de la UEFA contra Croacia. Celebraci√≥n hist√≥rica en el minuto 34. Cristiano Ronaldo anot√≥ este jueves 5 de septiembre de manera oficial su gol n√∫mero 900 como futbolista profesional. El atacante de 39 a√±os lleg√≥ a la hist√≥rica cifra en el compromiso entre la selecci√≥n de Portugal contra Croacia por la fecha 1 de la Liga de Naciones de la UEFA. La celebraci√≥n de Cristiano se registr√≥ en el minuto 34, luego de recibir un centro dentro del √°rea por parte de Nuno M√©ndez. El experimentado delantero le gan√≥ la posici√≥n a la defensa rival para rematar en solitario con su guayo derecho. Lea tambi√©n: [Alex Morgan se retira: la leyenda del f√∫tbol femenino de EE.UU. se despide](https://www.lafm.com.co/deportes/futbol/alex-morgan-se-retira-la-leyenda-del-futbol-femenino-de-eeuu-se-despide) Cristiano Ronaldo lleg√≥ a los 900 goles como profesional, despu√©s de jugar 1238 partidos oficial. El portugu√©s contabilizar una media de 0,73 celebraciones por encuentro. Los tantos de Cr7 llegaron con la camiseta de Sporting de Lisboa, Manchester United, Real Madrid, Juventus, Al Nassr y la selecci√≥n de Portugal. Le puede interesar: [Colombia suma su quinto oro en los Paral√≠mpicos: hist√≥rica medalla en boccia](https://www.lafm.com.co/deportes/colombia-suma-su-quinto-oro-en-los-paralimpicos-historica-medalla-en-boccia) Con Sporting celebr√≥ cinco tantos, en Manchester United festej√≥ 145, mientras que con Real Madrid consigui√≥ una marca de 450. En Juventus anot√≥ en 101 oportunidades y en Al Nassr lleva 67 anotaciones. Finalmente, con la selecci√≥n de Portugal ha logrado 131 goles. author: alfre2
title: #23 C√≥mo perder la alcald√≠a de Pamplona y la reputaci√≥n en una sola frase
text:
[Osdransky](/user/Osdransky)a [eldiario.es](/go/link/3891544)
La plaza consistorial de Pamplona parece sanfermines en esta moci√≥n pero el PP sigue sin entender absolutamente nada!!!!
Idos a tomar por culo!!!!!!!
[#1](c1#c-1) llevan as√≠ desde la recogida de firmas para derogar el estatut catal√°n. Pero que sigan, que sigan.
[#10](c10#c-10) y eso que all√≠ ponen todos los impedimentos posibles para que la gente no vote (sobre todo los grupos poblacionales que no suelen votar a los republicanos).
[#1](c1#c-1) Positivo por el elefante uso del imperativo del verbo ir con el encl√©tico "os". Aunque la real academia admite desde hace a√±os "iros" y todos recordamos con cari√±o aquel "si me quer√©is, irse" de la gran Lola no es menos cierto que "Idos a tomar por culo" destila elegancia, clasicismo, ritmo, gracia y donaire en cada s√≠laba.
[#9](c9#c-9) No hay ning√∫n clasismo, todo lo contrario, est√° reconociendo la dureza de ese trabajo y el m√©rito que tiene hacerlo.
Es como si dijera "preferir√≠a trabajar en la mina". Se refiere a la dureza del trabajo.
No va a decir "preferir√≠a trabajar como CEO de un el√©ctrica", lo cual no suena a trabajo f√≠sico duro.
Ning√∫n clasismo, pero lo dice elpanfleto.es, manipulando, y os lo trag√°is todo sin masticar. Qu√© pena. Un poquito de capacidad cr√≠tica no os vendr√≠a mal, deber√≠ais intentarlo, aunque os cueste, debido a que hay que pensar y eso no es f√°cil para vosotros. Es m√°s f√°cil formar parte del reba√±o.
Creo que les ha retratado muy bien. Estoy un poco cansado de eldiario pero este art√≠culo es bastante adecuado.
[#0](c0#c-0) gracias
[#2](c2#c-2) Tranquilo, tienen todo el escudo medi√°tico. No lo ver√°s en el telediario de A3, salvo que esa misma frase la hubiera dicho una alcaldesa del PSOE o de SUMAR.
[#5](c5#c-5) Al hilo de lo que dices, hoy he visto las noticias de la noche de A¬∑, con Vicente Vall√©s, y, en alg√∫n momento cre√≠a que le iba a dar un infarto: los independentistas, Bildu, traici√≥n del PSOE, traici√≥n de S√°nchez y as√≠ as√≠... Uno, si sigue escuchando cree que va a llegar el final de la democracia y el apocalipsis, como m√≠nimo.
[#6](c6#c-6) es indecente lo de ese se√±or... verlo vomitar bilis de esa manera, da muchisima grima, no se como no le aconseja alguien que se modere un poco
A m√≠ el que me hace gracia es Feij√≥ diciendo que el PSOE ya no es un partido constitucionalista.
Pues no s√©, creo que debi√≥ quedarse dormido en el art√≠culo 1 porque en el 140 ya te dice de forma general c√≥mo se eligen los concejales y como son √©stos los que eligen a un alcalde.
En fin, que habr√° quien le compre el discurso, pero no hay por donde cogerlo

author: Christian M. Wade | Statehouse Reporter
title: Lawmakers approve ban on 'revenge' porn | Boston | eagletribune.com
text: BOSTON ‚Äî Massachusetts is poised to join a majority of states in banning the posting of sexually explicit images on the Internet to harass people, with legislation sent Thursday to Gov. Maura Healey. The bipartisan bill would create a new felony offense for individuals charged with distributing a sexually explicit image "for purposes of revenge or embarrassment," and give judges the authority to ensure explicit images are destroyed. Violators could face up to 2-1/2 years in prison and fines of $10,000. A key provision of the bill focuses on "coercive control" against abuse victims and bans the posting of sexually explicit "deepfakes" or a computer-generated manipulation of a person‚Äôs voice or likeness using artificial intelligence programs. Lawmakers who sponsored the bill recalled the stories that domestic violence victims told during emotional hearings, many involving the posting of lewd pictures on the Internet without their consent. "Clearly, it has taken longer than many of us would have liked, but today the day has arrived for us to take decisive action," Senate Minority Leader Bruce Tarr, R-Gloucester, said in remarks on the Senate floor Thursday. "That day could not come soon enough." It would also ease criminal sanctions for minors who are caught exchanging illicit materials to one another, who under current state laws are subject to felony charges of distributing or possession of child pornography. Youthful offenders could be eligible for a diversion program that avoids criminal sanctions, under the plan. "We all acknowledge that young people make mistakes. Their mind hasn't been fully developed," Sen. John Keenan, D-Quincy, said in remarks Thursday. "Rather than put them into the criminal justice system ... they will go to the diversion program." Massachusetts is one of only two states ‚Äî the other is South Carolina ‚Äî that doesn‚Äôt have laws against so-called revenge porn, which involves adults posting sexually explicit images of a former spouse or ex-partner on the internet to harass them. The proposal is part of a package that seeks to close loopholes in protections for survivors of domestic violence, sexual assault, and assault and battery. Domestic violence victims have packed public hearings on Beacon Hill in support of the proposed law, many recalling stories of ex-partners posting lewd pictures of them on the internet to embarrass and harass them. Former Gov. Charlie Baker, a Republican, filed similar proposals, which also called for toughening rules aimed at keeping ‚Äúdangerous‚Äù suspects locked up while awaiting trial, during his eight years in office. None were approved. The House approved a revenge porn bill in 2022, but the Senate didn‚Äôt take it up before the end of the legislative session. The House and Senate approved the proposals earlier this year, but differences between the two bills needed to be worked out in a six-member conference committee before sending it to Healey's desk for consideration. Christian M. Wade covers the Massachusetts Statehouse for North of Boston Media Group‚Äôs newspapers and websites. Email him at [cwade@cnhinews.com](mailto:cwade@cnhinews.com)

author: Shawn Johnson
title: Asia shares rise on Fed outlook as PBOC keeps rates intact: Market down
text:
(Bloomberg) ‚Äî Asian shares were mostly higher on Friday after traders bet on a Federal Reserve interest rate cut this year. China shares erased earlier losses as investors ignored the central bank's decision to keep the key policy rate on hold.
Most read from Bloomberg
MSCI Asia Pacific share indexes rose for a third session on Friday after a surprise drop in U.S. producer prices prompted fears the Fed will reduce borrowing costs in coming months.
China's benchmark CSI 300 index erased losses after falling as much as 0.7% earlier when the People's Bank of China held the rate on its one-year policy loan ‚Äì called a medium-term lending facility ‚Äì at 2.5%. This was contrary to economists' expectation that it would be cut by 10 basis points.
Japanese shares rose after both the Topix and Nikkei 225 indexes hit 34-year highs last week amid an influx of foreign investors. Shares in Taiwan rose after the Democratic Progressive Party won the presidential election and the more China-friendly Kuomintang gained just enough seats to control the assembly.
US stock futures in Asia were little changed after the S&P 500 closed with modest gains on Friday. US markets are closed on Monday due to holiday.
The dollar was mixed while Treasury 10-year futures were little changed. There is no cash transaction in the Treasury due to holidays in America.
Shares of Baidu Inc fell the most in more than a year after a report linked its Ernie AI platform to major Chinese military research into artificial intelligence.
Oil was little changed as the threat that airstrikes by the US and allies against the Houthis would spark a wider conflict and disrupt the flow of crude from the Middle East was balanced by softness in fundamentals.
Some key events in the markets this week:
-
The World Economic Forum in Davos begins on Monday with this year's theme ‚ÄúRebuilding Trust‚Äù.

Eurozone industrial production, Monday

shares
